div.ab: To make placenta go off: Take a seed that is called in the vernacular "dente cavallin", and burn the same seed before the woman, and let the smoke go into her mouth and into her nose, and let the smoke go fully into her body, so she must let out the placenta immediately, God-willing. From the mouth of Rabbi Moshe Castillian, and in the name of his mother he said it to me.
One who has a worm in a finger:
